Title: 1. People
Write-Up Text: As the Australian May budget approaches; netizens are sharing their opinions via social media. Some criticize the Labor party's plan to cut $1500 from the lowest paid workers' wages and argue for budget restraint while others release their own budgets addressing issues such as private health insurance and the unfair increase of HECS student loans. Meanwhile critics accuse politicians of perpetuating unfair taxation creating fear of media spin to follow any benefits given. As the nation awaits the upcoming budget all eyes are on the government's plans as discussions and debates continue on social media.
